stress.quote: Anxiety is the handmaiden of contemporary ambition
stress.author: Alain de Botton (Status Anxiety)

stress.quote: Today I escaped anxiety. Or no, I discarded it, because it was within me, in my own perceptions – not outside
stress.author: Marcus Aurelius

stress.quote: Cultivate calm and stillness: let go of anxiety as a lifestyle
stress.author: Brené Brown

stress.quote: If you aren’t in the moment, you are either looking forward to uncertainty, or back to pain and regret
stress.author: Jim Carrey

stress.quote: He who fears he will suffer, already suffers because he fears
stress.author: Michel de Montaigne

stress.quote: Life is not a tension anywhere except in the minds of humanity
stress.author: Osho

stress.quote: It’s important to give up – maybe daily – the longing to be perfect…what a heavy burden
stress.author: Fred Rogers

stress.quote: All this hurrying from place to place won’t bring you any relief, for you’re traveling in the company of your own emotions, followed by your troubles all the way
stress.author: Seneca (Moral Letters to Lucilius, Amazon Book)

stress.quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present without anxious dependence upon the future, not to amuse ourselves with either hopes or fears but to rest satisfied, for he that is wants nothing
stress.author: Seneca

stress.quote: Stop being tormented by everyone else’s reaction to you
stress.author: Joyce Meyer

stress.quote: Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset
stress.author: What is anything in life compared to peace of soul? Francis de Sales

stress.quote: We labour at our daily work more ardently and thoughtlessly than is necessary to sustain our life because it is even more necessary not to have leisure to stop and think. Haste is universal because everyone is in flight from himself
stress.author: Friedrich Nietzsche (Untimely Meditations, Amazon Book)

stress.quote: Stepping out of the busyness is perhaps the most beautiful offering we can make to our spirit
stress.author: Tara Brach (Radical Acceptance, Amazon Book)

stress.quote: Don’t worry about achieving. Don’t worry about perfection. Just be there each moment as best you can
stress.author: Pema Chödrön

stress.quote: With my desire to improve everything, I destroy the moment
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself
stress.author: Michel de Montaigne

stress.quote: It is always possible to practice releasing the tension in yourself
stress.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: Anxiety, the illness of our time, comes primarily from our inability to dwell in the present moment
stress.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: I have not ceased being fearful, but I have ceased to let fear control me
stress.author: Erica Jong

stress.quote: Often the moment when we most need to pause is exactly when it feels most intolerable to do so
stress.author: Tara Brach (Radical Acceptance)

stress.quote: Rather than relaxing and enjoying who we are and what we’re doing, we are comparing ourselves with an ideal and trying to make up for the difference
stress.author: Tara Brach (Radical Acceptance)

stress.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, not to anticipate the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly
stress.author: Buddha

stress.quote: We can let the circumstances of our lives harden us so that we become increasingly resentful and afraid, or we can let them soften us
stress.author: Pema Chödrön

stress.quote: A warrior accepts that we can never know what will happen to us next
stress.author: Pema Chödrön

stress.quote: Stop measuring days by degree of productivity and start experiencing them by degree of presence
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: Cultivate intuition and trust faith: let go of the need for certainty
stress.author: Brené Brown

stress.quote: He who hurries through life hurries to his grave. George R. R
stress.author: Martin (A Clash of Kings, 1999)

stress.quote: Fear exists only in your mind, not in nature. Detach yourself, be strong, trust life, become life
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Don’t underestimate the value of doing nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can’t hear, and not bothering
stress.author: Winnie the Pooh

stress.quote: When we’re anxious, disconnected, vulnerable, alone, and feeling helpless, the booze and food and work and endless hours online feel like comfort, but in reality they’re only casting their long shadows over our lives
stress.author: Brené Brown (Daring Greatly, Amazon Book)

stress.quote: The three great American vices seem to be efficiency, punctuality, and the desire for achievement and success. They are the things that make the Americans so unhappy and so nervous
stress.author: Lin Yutang

stress.quote: It did what all ads are supposed to do: create an anxiety relievable by purchase
stress.author: David Foster Wallace (Infinite Jest, Amazon Book)

stress.quote: Worrying is carrying tomorrow’s load with today’s strength – carrying two days at once. It is moving into tomorrow ahead of time. Worrying doesn’t empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength
stress.author: Corrie Ten Boom

stress.quote: The reason why worry kills more people than work is that more people worry than work
stress.author: Robert Frost

stress.quote: The person who trusts can relax into existence. The person who cannot trust remains tense, remains anxious, afraid
stress.author: Osho

stress.quote: Persistent, non-specific anxiety is the result of wanting so much, talking so much, and doing so much that you lose touch with the quiet joys of solitude
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: You can’t always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside
stress.author: Wayne Dyer

stress.quote: The desire for security and the feeling of insecurity are the same thing
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: Be patient with everyone, but above all with yourself…do not be disheartened by your imperfections, but always rise up with fresh courage
stress.author: Francis de Sales

stress.quote: I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened
stress.author: Mark Twain

stress.quote: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs
stress.author: Henry Ford

stress.quote: If a problem is fixable, there is no need to worry. If it’s not fixable, then there is no benefit in worrying whatsoever
stress.author: 14th Dalai Lama

stress.quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them
stress.author: Maya Angelou

stress.quote: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it
stress.author: Kahlil Gibran

stress.quote: Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths
stress.author: Charles Spurgeon

stress.quote: Why should we be in such desperate haste to succeed and in such desperate enterprises? If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music he hears, however measured or far away
stress.author: Henry David Thoreau

stress.quote: A great many worries can be diminished by realizing the unimportance of the matter which is causing the anxiety
stress.author: Bertrand Russell

stress.quote: Be scared. You can’t help that. But don’t be afraid
stress.author: William Faulkner

stress.quote: Who of you by worrying can add a single hour to your life?
stress.author: Luke 12:25-31

stress.quote: All your anxiety is because of your desire for harmony. Seek disharmony, then you will gain peace
stress.author: Rumi

stress.quote: If you are depressed you are living in the past. If you are anxious you are living in the future. If you are at peace you are living in the present
stress.author: Lao Tzu

stress.quote: Men seek rest in a struggle against difficulties; and when they have conquered these, rest becomes insufferable
stress.author: Blaise Pascal

stress.quote: I never worry about what I did the day before. Dwight D
stress.author: Eisenhower

stress.quote: Do what you can, with what you’ve got, where you are
stress.author: Theodore Roosevelt

stress.quote: We are terrified by the idea of being terrified
stress.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

stress.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself
stress.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

stress.quote: Present fears are less than horrible imaginings
stress.author: William Shakespeare (Macbeth)

stress.quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world — not even our troubles
stress.author: Charlie Chaplin

stress.quote: Create more. Consume less
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Worry is a prayer to chaos
stress.author: Gabby Bernstein

stress.quote: Ignorance is the cause of fear
stress.author: Seneca (Natural Questions)

stress.quote: The devil cries when you don’t worry
stress.author: @AmuseChimp

stress.quote: The universe doesn’t allow perfection
stress.author: Stephen Hawking

stress.quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow
stress.author: Charlotte Brontë

stress.quote: You are rich if you can take your time
stress.author: @orangebook_

stress.quote: For fast acting relief, try slowing down
stress.author: Lily Tomlin

stress.quote: Need less, worry less. Simple = Beautiful
stress.author: Thibaut (@kpaxs)

stress.quote: What separates people is how they respond
stress.author: Shane Parrish (@shaneaparrish)

stress.quote: During the night we must wait for the light
stress.author: Francis de Sales

stress.quote: Worry often gives a small thing a big shadow
stress.author: Swedish proverb

stress.quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams
stress.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

stress.quote: What we fear we also desire, and what we desire we fear
stress.author: Erica Jong

stress.quote: The first step: Don’t be anxious. Nature controls it all
stress.author: Marcus Aurelius

stress.quote: Loving people live in a loving world. Hostile people live in a hostile world. Same world
stress.author: Wayne Dyer

stress.quote: We need, above all things, to slow down and get ourselves to amble through life instead of to rush through it
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: Trust yourself. You’ve survived a lot, and you’ll survive whatever is coming
stress.author: Robert Tew

stress.quote: Always do the things you fear the most. Courage is an acquired taste, like caviar
stress.author: Erica Jong

stress.quote: The beauty we long for is already here
stress.author: Tara Brach (Radical Acceptance)

stress.quote: Lay hold of today’s task, and you will not need to depend so much upon tomorrow’s
stress.author: Seneca

stress.quote: Today, you can decide to walk in freedom. You can choose to walk differently. You can walk as a free person, enjoying every step
stress.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: When you become comfortable with uncertainty, infinite possibilities open up in your life. It means fear is no longer a dominant factor in what you do and no longer prevents you from taking action to initiate change
stress.author: Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: Excitement and emotion arise when something is not understood. As it is understood, one naturally becomes unfazed. One naturally becomes equanimous
stress.author: Kapil Gupta

stress.quote: Time is a great oppressor. It smothers our spirit. Once you’re free of the pressure of time you can operate in a state of flow where you move intuitively without being disrupted by a tight schedule. This is the fluid, creative state where you’re at ease and function at your peak
stress.author: @TheAncientSage

stress.quote: The mind freed from passions is an impenetrable fortress – a person has no more secure place of refuge for all time
stress.author: Marcus Aurelius (Meditations, Amazon Book)

stress.quote: Amateurs are scared – scared to be vulnerable and honest with themselves. Professionals feel like they are capable of handling almost anything
stress.author: Shane Parrish

stress.quote: There is nothing more powerful than releasing the need to control and relying on a power greater than you to restore your thoughts and energy
stress.author: Gabby Bernstein

stress.quote: It doesn’t really matter what you are afraid of. Trust yourself enough to confront it, walk through it and survive
stress.author: Iyanla Vanzant

stress.quote: Sorrow looks back, worry looks around, faith looks up
stress.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

stress.quote: The wiser you get, the more you ignore things that are useless
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: You are far from the only nervous person in the room
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations. The best is yet to come
stress.author: Zig Ziglar

stress.quote: The truly patient man neither complains of his hard lot nor desires to be pitied by others. He speaks of his sufferings in a natural, true, and sincere way, without murmuring, complaining, or exaggerating them
stress.author: Francis de Sales

stress.quote: It’s the American obsession to feel happy all the time that makes Americans miserable. Because then you’re upset about being unhappy. And even when you’re happy, you’re worried about when it’ll go away. Thus "The Happiness Trap"
stress.author: Cameron Sepah

stress.quote: The faster and busier things get, the more we need to build thinking time into our schedule. And the noisier things get, the more we need to build quiet reflection spaces in which we can truly focus
stress.author: Greg McKeown

stress.quote: Cultivate play and rest: let go of exhaustion as a status symbol and productivity as self-worth
stress.author: Brené Brown

stress.quote: The ultimate purpose of inquiry is that it allows us to pause. In the space of a pause, truth can shine through
stress.author: Tara Brach (Radical Acceptance)

stress.quote: Use your time, energy and talents to do the best you can right now. Spend no time wishing it were better
stress.author: Iyanla Vanzant

stress.quote: Everything is fleeting. Why care? Why become emotional about something which is temporary, which you’ll soon forget? Just sit back and observe the transience of everything. You’ll see how you waste your energy on trifles. Most things are just not worth fretting about
stress.author: @TheAncientSage

stress.quote: If you can change your focus, you can change your future. Don’t spend a minute worrying about something that you can’t control. If something can’t be changed by you taking direct action, put it out of your mind. Today’s society is overrun with useless distractions
stress.author: Jim O’Shaughnessy

stress.quote: Wherever you are, be there totally. If you find your here and now intolerable and it makes you unhappy, you have three options: remove yourself from the situation, change it, or accept it totally
stress.author: Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: Breath by breath, let go of fear, expectation, anger, regret, cravings, frustration, fatigue. Let go of the need for approval. Let go of old judgments and opinions. Die to all that, and fly free. Soar in the freedom of desirelessness
stress.author: Lama Surya Das

stress.quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor
stress.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: A positive attitude gives you power over your circumstances instead of your circumstances having power over you
stress.author: Joyce Meyer

stress.quote: You’ll find that life is still worthwhile, if you just smile
stress.author: Charlie Chaplin

stress.quote: A rational person can find peace by cultivating indifference to things outside of their control
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Anxiety’s like a rocking chair. It gives you something to do, but it doesn’t get you very far
stress.author: Jodi Picoult (Sing You Home: A Novel)

stress.quote: Free time is death to the anxious, and thank goodness I don’t have any of it right now
stress.author: Jon Stewart

stress.quote: The cure for anything is salt water: tears, sweat, or the sea
stress.author: Isak Dinesen

stress.quote: The mind is like a television set with hundreds of channels
stress.author: Which channel will you turn on? Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: Of all your troubles, great and small, the greatest are the ones that don’t happen at all
stress.author: Thomas Carlyle

stress.quote: There is no trouble so great or grave that cannot be much diminished by a nice cup of tea
stress.author: Bernard-Paul Heroux

stress.quote: Relax; the world’s not watching that closely. It’s too busy contemplating itself in the mirror. Richelle E
stress.author: Goodrich

stress.quote: We trouble our life by thoughts about death, and our death by thoughts about life
stress.author: Michel de Montaigne

stress.quote: What we seek is some kind of compensation for what we put up with
stress.author: Haruki Murakami

stress.quote: She was terrified of everything, and terrified to show it
stress.author: David Foster Wallace

stress.quote: The level to which we protect ourselves from being vulnerable is a measure of our fear and disconnection
stress.author: Brené Brown (Daring Greatly)

stress.quote: Hope is a kind of opium; it keeps you intoxicated. To tolerate the miserable present, your eyes remain fixed on a faraway star: your hope
stress.author: Osho

stress.quote: Unresolved thoughts, prematurely pushed out of the mind, pile up in an internal landfill – which eventually pokes out of the subconscious and manifests as chronic, nonspecific anxiety
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: This runaway thinking is just a recipe for anxiety, which is always causing me to try and live forward into the next, into the next, into the next. It’s keeping me moving, moving, moving, and not happy, and not peaceful, and not present
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: We human beings are what we have been for millions of years – colossally greedy, envious, aggressive, jealous, anxious and despairing, with occasional flashes of joy and affection
stress.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

stress.quote: You look to others for hope and guidance because you are empty and poor; you turn to books, pictures, teachers, gurus and saviours to inspire and strengthen you; you are ever in hunger, ever seeking but never finding
stress.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

stress.quote: What we have to discover is that there is no safety, that seeking it is painful, and that when we imagine we have found it, we don’t like it
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: Some of us are luckier than others. Some are tough and some are weak. Some are rich and some poor. But no one’s superman – in that way, we’re all weak. If we own things, we’re terrified we’ll lose them; if we’ve got nothing we worry it’ll be that way forever. We’re all the same
stress.author: Haruki Murakami

stress.quote: Do not become upset when difficulty comes your way. Laugh in its face and know that you are in the hands of God
stress.author: Francis de Sales

stress.quote: Anxiety shows that we are too close to the world and too far from God
stress.author: John Piper

stress.quote: Prosperity is ever providing itself with anxieties
stress.author: Publius Syrus

stress.quote: To venture causes anxiety, but not to venture is to lose one’s self… And to venture in the highest is precisely to be conscious of one’s self
stress.author: Søren Kierkegaard

stress.quote: If you trade your authenticity for safety, you may experience the following: anxiety, depression, eating disorders, addiction, rage, blame, resentment, and inexplicable grief
stress.author: Brené Brown

stress.quote: You’re anxious because you avoid anxiety provoking situations
stress.author: Paul Domenick

stress.quote: You call it hope – that fire of fire! It is but agony of desire
stress.author: Edgar Allan Poe

stress.quote: Stop worrying about your f*cking future. Start creating it instead. Use your present wisely. And f*ck the past. It’s over. Bury it
stress.author: Fateh Singh

stress.quote: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom
stress.author: Søren Kierkegaard

stress.quote: Thought is responsible for fear. Thought is responsible for pleasure
stress.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

stress.quote: There is nothing that the busy man is less busy with than living; there is nothing harder to learn
stress.author: Seneca

stress.quote: They lose the day in expectation of the night, and the night in fear of the dawn
stress.author: Seneca

stress.quote: Whoever has learned to be anxious in the right way has learned the ultimate
stress.author: Søren Kierkegaard

stress.quote: Anxiety is the human condition. It’s probably the single most pervasive emotion
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Humans aren’t evolved to worry about everything happening outside of their immediate environment
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Perhaps all anxiety might derive from a fixation on moments — an inability to accept life as ongoing
stress.author: Sarah Manguso

stress.quote: Chasing after the things one yearns for is inferior to chasing after the source of the yearning
stress.author: Wu Hsin

stress.quote: Short-term thinking makes people desperate, ungenerous, impulsive. Long-term thinking makes people calm, gracious, controlled. The mighty pyramids and cathedrals were built by civilizations with a long time horizon, so it is with the life of a great man
stress.author: @TheStoicEmperor

stress.quote: Anxiety contaminates the present with the pains of all imaginable futures. We cannot experience the fullness of the moment if we are forever suffering from hypothetical hardships
stress.author: @TheStoicEmperor

stress.quote: The anxiety many feel is a result of trying to live in the world their imagination created, while being forced to live in the real world
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Life seems to be a process of replacing one anxiety with another and substituting one desire for another – which is not to say that we should never strive to overcome any of our anxieties or fulfil any of our desires, but rather to suggest that we should perhaps build into our strivings an awareness of the way our goals promise us a respite and a resolution that they cannot, by definition, deliver
stress.author: Alain de Botton (Status Anxiety, Amazon Book)

stress.quote: People think it would be nice to have peace of mind, to be serene, to be calm, to be undisturbed by this, that, and the other. But as long as you make all those things objects of desire, you have defined yourself as lacking them
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: No amount of anxiety can change the future. No amount of regret can change the past
stress.author: Karen Salmansohn

stress.quote: Most of us live in a post-scarcity world, yet are still running mental algorithms from a resource scare world. Thus we have anxiety, overconsumption and self-torture. Seeing that truth is the first step to liberation
stress.author: Justin Kan

stress.quote: Desire disappears as you become more and more aware. When awareness is one hundred percent, there is no desire at all
stress.author: Osho

stress.quote: Remember one thing: except for silence, everything else is your imagination – howsoever beautiful
stress.author: Osho

stress.quote: There’s no situation that calls for mild anxiety. Either increase the level of stress to promote action, or forget about it and enjoy life
stress.author: Johnny Uzan

stress.quote: To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections
stress.author: Dogen

stress.quote: Man is not worried by real problems so much as by his imagined anxieties about real problems
stress.author: Epictetus

stress.quote: A crust eaten in peace is better than a banquet partaken in anxiety
stress.author: Aesop

stress.quote: One is a great deal less anxious if one feels perfectly free to be anxious
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: Two kinds of happiness. Worldly happiness is reward from our evolutionary program. Get praise, money, drugs, sex. It busies the mind with craving and anxiety. Internal happiness is reward from being in flow. Create, meditate, love, play. It clears the mind and leaves us in peace
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Sit with the pain until it passes, and you will be calmer for the next one
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Without pain, without sacrifice, we would have nothing
stress.author: Fight Club

stress.quote: Let go of the past
stress.author: Robert Greene

stress.quote: Adversity is the first path to truth
stress.author: Lord Byron

stress.quote: Great things never came from comfort zones
stress.author: Neil Strauss

stress.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it
stress.author: Helen Keller

stress.quote: It is always by way of pain one arrives at pleasure
stress.author: Marquis de Sade

stress.quote: True self-discovery begins where your comfort zone ends
stress.author: Adam Braun

stress.quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: that word is love
stress.author: Sophocles

stress.quote: Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you
stress.author: Ovid

stress.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom
stress.author: Oprah Winfrey

stress.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings
stress.author: Lao Tzu

stress.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment
stress.author: Marcus Aurelius

stress.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice
stress.author: Bob Marley

stress.quote: Every pain is a gift. Every pain is an opportunity
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: The root of all suffering is attachment
stress.author: Buddha

stress.quote: What hurts us is what heals us
stress.author: Paulo Coelho

stress.quote: I can bear any pain as long as it has meaning
stress.author: Haruki Murakami (1Q84)

stress.quote: Change happens when the pain of staying the same is greater than the pain of change
stress.author: Tony Robbins

stress.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars
stress.author: Kahlil Gibran

stress.quote: People go through so much pain trying to avoid pain
stress.author: Neil Strauss

stress.quote: Too many people believe that everything must be pleasurable in life, which makes them constantly search for distractions and short-circuits the learning process
stress.author: Robert Greene

stress.quote: Most of the gains in life come from suffering in the short term, so you can get paid in the long term
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Pain makes me grow. Growing is what I want. Therefore, for me pain is pleasure
stress.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

stress.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone
stress.author: Neale Donald Walsch

stress.quote: It is when I struggle that I strengthen. It is when challenged to my core that I learn the depth of who I am
stress.author: Steve Maraboli

stress.quote: Be master of your petty annoyances and conserve your energies for the big, worthwhile things. It isn’t the mountain ahead that wears you out – it’s the grain of sand in your shoe
stress.author: Robert Service

stress.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection
stress.author: Thomas Paine

stress.quote: The pain will leave once it has finished teaching you
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: I’ve learned more from pain than I could’ve ever learned from pleasure
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Failure gave me strength. Pain was my motivation
stress.author: Michael Jordan

stress.quote: Remember anything you want that’s valuable requires you to break through short-term pain in order to gain long-term pleasure
stress.author: Tony Robbins

stress.quote: Pain nourishes courage. You can’t be brave if you’ve only had wonderful things happen to you
stress.author: Mary Tyler Moore

stress.quote: You can’t run away from trouble. There ain’t no place that far
stress.author: Uncle Remus

stress.quote: You must go through that short-term pain to reach long-term gains. A meaningful life is about growth, not comfort
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: The more you reject the past, the more your suffering lasts
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: We do survive every moment, after all, except the last one
stress.author: John Updike

stress.quote: The aim of the wise is not to secure pleasure but to avoid pain
stress.author: Aristotle

stress.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey
stress.author: Kenji Miyazawa

stress.quote: You may have had unfair things happen to you, but the depth of your pain is an indication of the height of your future
stress.author: Joel Osteen

stress.quote: There is no education like adversity
stress.author: Benjamin Disraeli

stress.quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there’s been some kind of pain
stress.author: Bob Dylan

stress.quote: Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional
stress.author: Buddha

stress.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going
stress.author: Winston Churchill

stress.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission
stress.author: Mahatma Gandhi

stress.quote: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons
stress.author: Jim Rohn

stress.quote: Laugher is the tonic, the relief, the surcease for pain
stress.author: Charlie Chaplin

stress.quote: The only thing that’s the end of the world is the end of the world
stress.author: Barack Obama

stress.quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience
stress.author: Julius Caesar

stress.quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened
stress.author: Ludwig Jacobowski

stress.quote: Nothing pains some people more than having to think
stress.author: Martin Luther King Jr

stress.quote: Let me embrace thee, sour adversity, for wise men say it is the wisest course
stress.author: William Shakespeare

stress.quote: There is a saying in Tibetan, ‘Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength’. No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that’s our real disaster
stress.author: Dalai Lama

stress.quote: One thing you can’t hide – is when you’re crippled inside
stress.author: John Lennon

stress.quote: Life is pain, so live it up while you can
stress.author: Ernest Hemingway

stress.quote: There are no gains without pains
stress.author: Benjamin Franklin

stress.quote: Smile, though your heart is aching. Smile, even though it’s breaking. When there are clouds in the sky, you’ll get by if you smile through your pain and sorrow. Smile and maybe tomorrow, you’ll see the sun come shining through for you
stress.author: Charlie Chaplin

stress.quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things
stress.author: Theodore Roosevelt

stress.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you
stress.author: Maya Angelou

stress.quote: My pain may be the reason for somebody’s laugh. But my laugh must never be the reason for somebody’s pain
stress.author: Charlie Chaplin

stress.quote: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain
stress.author: Bob Marley

stress.quote: Better bread with water than cake with trouble
stress.author: Russian proverb

stress.quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors
stress.author: African proverb

stress.quote: The art of life is the art of avoiding pain
stress.author: Thomas Jefferson

stress.quote: The cost of failure is learning
stress.author: Neil Strauss

stress.quote: It hurts because it matters
stress.author: John Green

stress.quote: That’s the thing about pain, it demands to be felt
stress.author: John Green

stress.quote: Our strength grows out of our weaknesses
stress.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

stress.quote: We can ignore even pleasure. But pain insists upon being attended to. C.S
stress.author: Lewis

stress.quote: Much of your pain is self-chosen
stress.author: Kahlil Gibran

stress.quote: I ask not for a lighter burden, but for broader shoulders
stress.author: Jewish proverb

stress.quote: The pain I feel now is the happiness I had before. That’s the deal. C.S
stress.author: Lewis

stress.quote: Embrace the feeling. Start the healing
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Pain is a great motivator
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: It’s better to feel pain than nothing at all
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Two barrels of tears will not heal a bruise
stress.author: Chinese proverb

stress.quote: Strange how we decorate pain
stress.author: Margaret Atwood

stress.quote: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil
stress.author: Aristotle

stress.quote: To hurt is as human as to breathe. J.K
stress.author: Rowling

stress.quote: Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic
stress.author: Cesare Pavese

stress.quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again
stress.author: Charles Dickens

stress.quote: Face your life, its pain, its pleasure, leave no path untaken
stress.author: Neil Gaiman

stress.quote: Move toward resistance and pain
stress.author: Robert Greene

stress.quote: True discovery happens when you embrace the obstacle. Truth is for the patient, the enduring
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Don’t let pain define you, let it refine you
stress.author: Tim Fargo

stress.quote: Passion is the bridge that takes you from pain to change
stress.author: Frida Kahlo

stress.quote: Stay focused on your purpose, not your pain
stress.author: Ranal Currie

stress.quote: And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom
stress.author: Anais Nin

stress.quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success
stress.author: Bo Bennett

stress.quote: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness, immobilized by the gravity of my loss, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have – life itself
stress.author: Walter Anderson

stress.quote: First, having the larger goal will lift your mind out of the moment and help you endure the hard work and drudgery. Second, as you become better at this task or craft, it becomes increasingly pleasurable
stress.author: Robert Greene

stress.quote: You think your pain and your heartbreak are unprecedented in the history of the world, but then you read. It was books that taught me that the things that tormented me most were the very things that connected me with all the people who were alive, who had ever been alive
stress.author: James Baldwin

stress.quote: Growth in painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don’t belong
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Often it’s the deepest pain which empowers you to grow into your highest self
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Stop saying "I wish" and start saying "I will"
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Every flower must grow through dirt
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Problems are the price you pay for progress
stress.author: Branch Rickey

stress.quote: After the rain, the sun will reappear. There is life. After the pain, the joy will still be here
stress.author: Walt Disney

stress.quote: Be soft. Do not let the world make you hard. Do not let pain make you hate. Do not let the bitterness steal your sweetness. Take pride that even though the rest of the world may disagree, you still believe it to be a beautiful place
stress.author: Iain Thomas

stress.quote: It’s so hard to forget pain, but it’s even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace
stress.author: Chuck Palahniuk

stress.quote: Sacrifice today for tomorrows betterment, you are willing to pay those payments with pain, because pain is just a message when you are fixing something that’s insufficient in your life
stress.author: Greg Plitt

stress.quote: I don’t believe there is pleasure in life. I believe there is only relief of pain… We have to suffer to be on top
stress.author: Georges St-Pierre

stress.quote: Don’t get lost in your pain, know that one day your pain will become your cure
stress.author: Rumi

stress.quote: Some days, we’re just looking for a soft place to land. Dr
stress.author: SunWolf

stress.quote: Nothing prevents happiness like the memory of happiness
stress.author: Andre Gide

stress.quote: Forget about winning and losing, forget about pride and pain
stress.author: Bruce Lee

stress.quote: We don’t even ask happiness, just a little less pain
stress.author: Charles Bukowski

stress.quote: What matters most is how well you walk through the fire
stress.author: Charles Bukowski

stress.quote: You have to die a few times before you can really live
stress.author: Charles Bukowski

stress.quote: The real problem is not why some pious, humble, believing people suffer, but why some do not. C.S
stress.author: Lewis

stress.quote: Along with pain comes satisfaction and with satisfaction comes relief
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Are you facing or avoiding your pain? Are you caring for your emotions or are you making yourself busy? Learn to wait and embrace your suffering. Fleeing it will simply bring more confusion. Facing it will bring clarity
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: The tragedy of life is in what dies inside a man while he lives – the death of genuine feeling, the death of inspired response, the awareness that makes it possible to feel the pain or the glory of other men in yourself
stress.author: Norman Cousins

stress.quote: The prettiest smile hides the deepest secrets. The prettiest eyes have cried the most tears. And the kindest hearts have felt the most pain
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: When the clouds get too heavy, it rains. When your pain gets too bad, you cry
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery
stress.author: Dante Alighieri

stress.quote: He who makes a beast out of himself gets rid of the pain of being a man. Dr
stress.author: Seuss

stress.quote: The cure for pain is in the pain
stress.author: Rumi

stress.quote: Pain is meant to wake us up. People try to hide their pain. But they’re wrong. Pain is something to carry, like a radio. You feel your strength in the experience of pain. It’s all in how you carry it. That’s what matters. Pain is a feeling. Your feelings are a part of you. Your own reality. If you feel ashamed of them, and hide them, you’re letting society destroy your reality. You should stand up for your right to feel your pain
stress.author: Jim Morrison

stress.quote: I think that humans have a huge capacity to carry pain and sadness. There are things that haunt us our entire lives; we are unable to let them go. The good times seem almost effervescent and dreamlike in comparison with the times that didn’t go so well
stress.author: Henry Rollins

stress.quote: Sooner or later, you will need to make friends with disappointment. Dr
stress.author: SunWolf

stress.quote: Humility, after the first shock, is a cheerful virtue. C.S
stress.author: Lewis

stress.quote: God whispers to us in our pleasures, speaks in our conscience, but shouts in our pains: it is his megaphone to rouse a deaf world. C.S
stress.author: Lewis

stress.quote: I have absolutely no pleasure in the stimulants in which I sometimes so madly indulge. It has not been in the pursuit of pleasure that I have periled life and reputation and reason. It has been the desperate attempt to escape from torturing memories, from a sense of insupportable loneliness and a dread of some strange impending doom
stress.author: Edgar Allan Poe

stress.quote: Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word. George R
stress.author: R (Game of Thrones)

stress.quote: God brings men into deep waters, not to drown them, but to cleanse them
stress.author: John Aughey

stress.quote: Some of God’s greatest gifts are unanswered prayers
stress.author: Garth Brooks

stress.quote: Life swings like a pendulum backward and forward between pain and boredom
stress.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

stress.quote: Neurosis is the natural by-product of pain avoidance
stress.author: Carl Jung

stress.quote: Life didn’t promise to be wonderful
stress.author: Teddy Pendergrass

stress.quote: Wisdom is nothing more than healed pain
stress.author: Robert Gary Lee

stress.quote: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace
stress.author: Thomas Paine

stress.quote: If experience is the mother of wisdom, pain is the father
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: We can learn and change in a state of pain and suffering, or we can evolve in a state of joy and inspiration
stress.author: Joe Dispenza

stress.quote: When I planted my pain in the field of patience it bore fruit of happiness
stress.author: Kahlil Gibran

stress.quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality
stress.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

stress.quote: Following a path is easy. Creating a new one is tough but it will lead you to new places
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain, because life’s greatest lessons are learnt through pain
stress.author: Nagato

stress.quote: Handling our suffering is an art. If we know how to suffer, we suffer much less, and we’re no longer afraid of being overwhelmed by the suffering inside
stress.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: Acceptance doesn’t mean resignation; it means understanding that something is what it is and that there’s got to be a way through it. Michael J
stress.author: Fox

stress.quote: When it hurts – observe. Life is trying to teach you something
stress.author: Anita Krizzan

stress.quote: Trying to build a life where you never experience bad feelings is like building a ship that can’t handle a storm
stress.author: Neil Strauss

stress.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover
stress.author: Sarah Frances Brown

stress.quote: Try to exclude the possibility of suffering which the order of nature and the existence of free wills involve, and you find that you have excluded life itself. C.S
stress.author: Lewis

stress.quote: The pain that you create now is always some form of nonacceptance, some form of unconscious resistance to what is
stress.author: Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: Prosperity is not without many fears and distastes, and adversity is not without comforts and hopes
stress.author: Francis Bacon

stress.quote: There is a thin line that separates laughter and pain, comedy and tragedy, humor and hurt
stress.author: Erma Bombeck

stress.quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Pain can change you, but that doesn’t mean it has to be a bad change. Take that pain and turn it into wisdom
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: There are two types of pain in this world: pain that hurts you, and pain that changes you
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Every negative situation contains the possibility for something positive, an opportunity. It is how you look at it that matters
stress.author: Robert Greene

stress.quote: Be the silent watcher of your thoughts and behavior. You are beneath the thinker. You are the stillness beneath the mental noise. You are the love and joy beneath the pain
stress.author: Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: There is no coming to consciousness without pain. People will do anything, no matter how absurd, in order to avoid facing their own Soul. One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious
stress.author: Carl Jung

stress.quote: Pain introduces you to your highest self
stress.author: Paul Domenick

stress.quote: Where the wound has been given, there must the cure be found, if anywhere
stress.author: Jane Austen

stress.quote: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment
stress.author: Henry David Thoreau

stress.quote: A calm and modest life brings more happiness than the pursuit of success combined with constant restlessness
stress.author: Albert Einstein

stress.quote: Stress is the inability to decide what’s important
stress.author: @AmuseChimp

stress.quote: Stress and confusion come from being busy. Peace and clarity come from slowing down and stilling your waters
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Stress is caused by being "here" but wanting to be "there"
stress.author: Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: Every once in a while, do you just like to take your time with what you’re doing?
stress.author: Fred Rogers

stress.quote: Today I refuse to stress myself out about things I cannot control or change
stress.author: Mel Robbins

stress.quote: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it
stress.author: Kahlil Gibran

stress.quote: The need for certainty is the greatest disease the mind faces
stress.author: Robert Greene

stress.quote: Society has sold you the greatest of lies, that the goal of life is to become "happy." This one chase has cost you your life
stress.author: Kapil Gupta

stress.quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you
stress.author: Anne Lamott

stress.quote: Unease, anxiety, tension, stress, worry – all forms of fear – are caused by too much future, and not enough presence
stress.author: Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: When we get too caught up in the busyness of the world, we lose connection with one another – and ourselves
stress.author: Jack Kornfield

stress.quote: You may have a million desires to be in other places, doing other things, but you are not there, you are here
stress.author: Zen proverb

stress.quote: The high value put upon every minute of time, the idea of hurry-hurry as the most important objective of living, is unquestionably the most dangerous enemy of joy
stress.author: Hermann Hesse

stress.quote: The anxiety of worry is almost always worse than the actual consequences. Stop worrying and start doing
stress.author: James Clear

stress.quote: The solution is often a good dose of indifference
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Don’t think about the past. Just be here now. Don’t think about the future. Just be here now
stress.author: Ram Dass

stress.quote: 90% of what you’re stressing about right now won’t even matter a year from now. Take a deep breath
stress.author: Mel Robbins

stress.quote: Throw out the excess, clean up the mess, say no to stress, and live with less
stress.author: Joshua Becker

stress.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment
stress.author: Marcus Aurelius

stress.quote: Don’t spin your wheels trying to get everything done. Focus on getting the right things done instead
stress.author: Greg McKeown

stress.quote: Comfort makes you weaker. We need some variability, some stressors. Not too much, but just enough
stress.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

stress.quote: In a year, 95% of the things that stress you out now you’ll look back and laugh at. The other 5%, you should probably get to work on
stress.author: Justin Kan

stress.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don’t resist them; that only creates sorrow
stress.author: Lao Tzu

stress.quote: Stress, anxiety and depression are caused when we are living to please others
stress.author: Paulo Coelho

stress.quote: Daily news and sugar confuse our system in the same manner
stress.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (Antifragile, Amazon book)

stress.quote: Our civilization, which is lost in doing, knows nothing of Being
stress.author: It asks: being? What do you do with it?" Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: We get such a kick out of looking forward to pleasures and rushing ahead to meet them that we can’t slow down to enjoy them when they come
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: Stress is not created by the events in your life, but by your reaction to them
stress.author: James Pierce

stress.quote: Only once you give yourself permission to stop trying to do it all, to stop saying yes to everyone, can you make your highest contribution towards the things that really matter
stress.author: Greg McKeown (Essentialism, Amazon book)

stress.quote: The faster and busier things get, the more we need to build thinking time into our schedule. And the noisier things get, the more we need to build quiet reflection spaces in which we can truly focus
stress.author: Greg McKeown

stress.quote: When a situation is within your control, take action. When a situation is outside your control, make preparations
stress.author: James Clear

stress.quote: Do not seek to have everything that happens happen as you wish, but wish for everything to happen as it actually does happen, and your life will be serene
stress.author: Epictetus

stress.quote: When you become a lover of what is, the war is over
stress.author: Byron Katie

stress.quote: Do not look for a sanctuary in anyone except your self
stress.author: Buddha

stress.quote: An ignorant state, stress is
stress.author: Yoda

stress.quote: A certain amount of doing nothing, and stopping rushing around, would cool everything
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment
stress.author: Marcus Aurelius

stress.quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another
stress.author: William James

stress.quote: In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers
stress.author: Fred Rogers

stress.quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom
stress.author: James Allen

stress.quote: Don’t try to force anything. Let life be a deep let-go. God opens millions of flowers every day without forcing their buds
stress.author: Osho

stress.quote: There are two medicines for all ills: time and silence
stress.author: Alexander Dumas

stress.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed
stress.author: Mahatma Gandhi

stress.quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure
stress.author: Oprah Winfrey

stress.quote: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself
stress.author: Hermann Hesse

stress.quote: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside
stress.author: Wayne Dyer

stress.quote: The truth is that there is no actual stress or anxiety in the world; it’s your thoughts that create these false beliefs. You can’t package stress, touch it, or see it. There are only people engaged in stressful thinking
stress.author: Wayne Dyer

stress.quote: If you really want to escape the things that harass you, what you’re needing is not to be in a different place but to be a different person
stress.author: Seneca

stress.quote: Ignorance is the softest pillow on which a man can rest his head
stress.author: Michel de Montaigne

stress.quote: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being
stress.author: Plato

stress.quote: Self-command is the main elegance
stress.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

stress.quote: Our root is quietude
stress.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching, Amazon book)

stress.quote: This too shall pass
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Let go of what may come
stress.author: Tilopa

stress.quote: Debt free is stress free. D
stress.author: Muthukrishnan

stress.quote: Embrace stress, don’t avoid it
stress.author: Shane Parrish

stress.quote: Make peace with the present moment
stress.author: Eckhart Tolle

stress.quote: Problems only exist in the human mind
stress.author: Anthony de Mello

stress.quote: The whole world is not looking at you
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Just do your best. Never try to impress
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Need less, worry less. Simple = Beautiful
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Tomorrow is overrated. Today is underrated
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Detachment naturally leads to tranquility
stress.author: @TheAncientSage

stress.quote: It’s not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it
stress.author: Hans Selye

stress.quote: Stop thinking, and end your problems
stress.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

stress.quote: You don’t always have to have something to do. Don’t rush. Conserve some of your resources for yourself
stress.author: Iyanla Vanzant

stress.quote: Your best self can be found based on how you respond to failure
stress.author: David Goggins

stress.quote: You know you’re becoming wise when you care more about what you control and less about what you don’t
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Every day brings a choice: to practice stress or to practice peace
stress.author: Joan Borysenko

stress.quote: You are far from the only nervous person in the room
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: When you have a moment, just listen to the beauty of silence. It has so much to say
stress.author: Armin Ganguly

stress.quote: Learn to watch your drama unfold while at the same time knowing you are more than your drama
stress.author: Ram Dass

stress.quote: When we stop opposing reality, action becomes simple, fluid, kind, and fearless
stress.author: Byron Katie

stress.quote: We should always be asking ourselves: "Is this something that is, or is not, in my control?"
stress.author: Epictetus

stress.quote: It is not external events themselves that cause us distress, but the way in which we think about them…It is our attitudes and reactions that give us trouble. We cannot choose our external circumstances, but we can always choose how we respond to them
stress.author: Epictetus

stress.quote: Renew yourself completely every day; do it again, and again, and forever again
stress.author: Zen proverb

stress.quote: If you feel lost… sit down, close your eyes, breathe, put your hands on your heart, repeat forever
stress.author: Courtney Carver

stress.quote: Stress exists only in your mind. Peace exists only in the acceptance of the present moment
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Let go of what has passed. Let go of what may come. Let go of what is happening now. Don’t try to figure anything out. Don’t try to make anything happen. Relax, right now, and rest
stress.author: Tilopa

stress.quote: When you need to calm down… Breathe in for 5 counts. Hold for 5 counts. Breathe out for 5 counts. Hold for 5 counts. Repeat the cycle 2 more times
stress.author: Gabby Bernstein

stress.quote: There are three things you cannot buy. Fitness: You have to keep fit, whether you’re rich or not. Diet: You cannot pay someone to be on a diet for you. Then, looking after your soul. No one can possibly treat your soul but you yourself
stress.author: Brunello Cucinelli

stress.quote: Observe a stressful thought. Notice how your shoulders tense, your stomach tightens, you hold your breath. Keep watching that same thought. Don’t push it away, instead change your reaction to it. Breathe deeply, let go, relax your body. You’re okay. It’s just a thought. Breathe
stress.author: Jason Garner

stress.quote: Stop doing. Start being. It begins with a single thought and a simple statement – I AM
stress.author: Iyanla Vanzant

stress.quote: Spend a week writing down everything that bothers you. Outrages in the news, personal slights, daily irritations. Read it a month later. How many entries feel important now? Probably not many. Excess reactivity steals happiness and energy
stress.author: @TheStoicEmperor

stress.quote: Stress and distractions have a mutually reinforcing relationship. They can drive one insane. Slow down, take a deep breath and relax. Pay attention to only one thing at a time. Also, don’t forget to clear mental junk every now and then by meditating for a few minutes
stress.author: @TheAncientSage

stress.quote: If you find yourself mentally exhausted: change your environment. Unclutter your desk. Take a shower. Go for a a walk. Refresh your mental state
stress.author: @LifeMathMoney

stress.quote: When you feel overwhelmed, start eliminating all the non-essential things from your life. Clarity brings calm
stress.author: Darius Foroux

stress.quote: Restore your attention or bring it to a new level by dramatically slowing down whatever you’re doing
stress.author: Sharon Salzberg

stress.quote: Finding a moment to sit and just do nothing can be very healing, transforming, and nourishing
stress.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: Dogs bark at what they cannot understand
stress.author: Heraclitus

stress.quote: Sometimes it’s better to react with no reaction
stress.author: Unknown

stress.quote: Never make a decision when you are stressed, depressed, or being caressed
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Do not worry about your difficulties in mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater
stress.author: Albert Einstein

stress.quote: The difficulty of describing things for Western ears is that people in a hurry cannot feel
stress.author: Alan Watts

stress.quote: Reality is the leading cause of stress amongst those in touch with it
stress.author: Lily Tomlin

stress.quote: Every kind of fear grows worse by not being looked at
stress.author: Bertrand Russell (The Conquest of Happiness, Amazon book)

stress.quote: When we don’t choose what’s important, everything seems important
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Awareness is inherently pure like the empty sky. Stress, annoyance, and anger can temporarily occupy its space but can never pollute it
stress.author: Haemin Sunim

stress.quote: The modern struggle: Lone individuals summoning inhuman willpower, fasting, meditating, and exercising, up against armies of scientists and statisticians weaponizing abundant food, screens, and medicine into junk food, clickbait news, infinite porn, endless games and addictive drugs
stress.author: Naval Ravikant

stress.quote: Human life is gradually turning from a struggle against suffering into a struggle against pleasure
stress.author: Gurwinder Bhogal

stress.quote: Stress is an ignorant state. It believes that everything is an emergency
stress.author: Natalie Goldberg

stress.quote: Stress is nothing more than a socially acceptable form of mental illness
stress.author: Richard Carlson

stress.quote: It’s not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it
stress.author: Hans Selye

stress.quote: Stress is a state of generalized vulnerability
stress.author: Luca Dellanna

stress.quote: How do you beat your inner turmoil? You can’t beat it, you can only stop creating it
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: The calm person makes a choice. The angry person finds that anger has chosen for them. Rage robs us of reason and makes us puppets of our lower instincts
stress.author: @TheStoicEmperor

stress.quote: The chief task in life is simply this: to identify and separate matters so that I can say clearly to myself which are externals not under my control, and which have to do with the choices I actually control
stress.author: Epictetus

stress.quote: We see striving everywhere inhibited in many ways, struggling everywhere; and thus always suffering; there is no final goal of striving, and therefore no bounds or end to suffering
stress.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

stress.quote: This world is all attachment. Yet you get worried because you are attached
stress.author: Neem Karoli Baba

stress.quote: Our real enemy is not man; it’s not another human being. Our real enemy is our ignorance, discrimination, fear, craving, and violence
stress.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

stress.quote: To discover and transcend craving, which is the deep cause of all conditioning, is arduous and demands constant awareness
stress.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

stress.quote: Much of the stress that people feel doesn’t come from having too much to do. It comes from not finishing what they started
stress.author: David Allen

stress.quote: Flow with whatever happens and let your mind be free
stress.author: Zhuangzi

stress.quote: The world is ruled by letting things take their course
stress.author: Lao Tzu

stress.quote: The river becomes calm when it reaches the ocean. Find your ocean each day
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Don’t rush. It’s wiser to go slowly in the right direction than fast in the wrong one
stress.author: Maxime Lagacé

stress.quote: Feeling irritated, restless, afraid, and hopeless is a reminder to listen more carefully. It’s a reminder to stop talking; watch and listen
stress.author: Pema Chödrön

stress.quote: What you want is to develop a sustainable habit: a stress-free approach to reducing your stress
stress.author: Greg McKeown

stress.quote: People work out, they stress their body, and their body gets stronger from stress
stress.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

stress.quote: Don’t be blindly ambitious or blindly lazy. Find a balance between mindful action and peaceful inaction
stress.author: @dailyzen

stress.quote: Remember that stress doesn’t come from what’s going on in your life. It comes from your thoughts about what’s going on in your life. Andrew J
stress.author: Bernstein

stress.quote: No desires, no goal, no seeking, no thoughts, neither obtaining, nor rejecting, nor grasping, nor letting go, being free
stress.author: Taisen Deshimaru

stress.quote: Stress happens when something you care about is at stake. It’s not a sign to run away – it’s a sign to step forward
stress.author: Kelly McGonigal (The Upside of Stress, Amazon book)

stress.quote: In general, obstacles force your mind to focus and find ways around them. They heighten your mental powers and should be welcomed
stress.author: Robert Greene

stress.quote: People think peace is positivity, but it’s not. Peace has no opposite, it is a kind of prevailing stillness that is present even in the midst of chaos. Don’t seek positivity. Don’t seek negativity. Accept what is there and find your peace regardless
stress.author: Thibaut

stress.quote: Short-term thinking makes people desperate, ungenerous, impulsive. Long-term thinking makes people calm, gracious, controlled. The mighty pyramids and cathedrals were built by civilizations with a long time horizon, so it is with the life of a great man
stress.author: @TheStoicEmperor

stress.quote: We all want comfort and fulfillment. But fulfillment demands progress, and progress is uncomfortable. Decide which one is higher on your values list, and be willing to pay the price
stress.author: Johnny Uzan

stress.quote: The most important timeframes: A. 10+ years ahead. B. This moment right now. Worries, small thinking, overplanning – they all happen in-between. And neither justifies leaving the present
stress.author: Johnny Uzan

stress.quote: Being scared isn’t a sign of weakness, it’s a sign something matters
stress.author: Shane Parrish

stress.quote: The just man is most free from disturbance, while the unjust is full of the utmost disturbance
stress.author: Epicurus

stress.quote: If you understood the nature of your problem, you wouldn’t have one
stress.author: Byron Katie

stress.quote: Most of the time, life isn’t an emergency. Much of the time, things will be fine. Save the rush for when it is needed
stress.author: Thibaut
